title: Braegis the Soul Sorceror - Mage
body:
Another champion idea: let me know what you think and don't forget to take a look at my other champions 

Braegis the Soul Sorceror
Mage

From the emptiness of purgatory Braegis has practiced the art of soul sorcery. Now in the realm of the living he feeds of the power of the recently deceased. Boldly entering the League for the twisted pleasure of retiring the living.

Passive - Soul Sentry
Whenever Braegis kills a enemy he gains a soul. 
Souls are used to activate abilities.
When Braegis dies any remaining souls will attack his killer.
Each soul does Braegis' level x 10 damage

Q - Soul Rend - 4/5/6/7/8 Souls - 10/9/8/7/6 sec CD
Braegis tethers the souls of all nearby enemies. 
After a 3 sec delay any enemy with the tether still intact takes 20/40/60/80/100 + AP damage

W -  Soul Snap - 2/4/6/8/10 Souls - 10 sec CD
Breagis jaunts the soul of an emeny champion dealing 20/30/40/50/60 + AP damage and slowing them by 20/25/30/35/40% for 3 secs.
If the enemy is under 50% health or is tethered by Braegis' Soul Rend they take double damage and are stunned for 2 secs instead

E - Soul Bomb - 4/5/6/7/8 Souls - 12/11/10/9/8 sec CD
Braegis lobs a Soul Bomb at the target area.
If the bomb lands on a enemy it attaches itself to them.
The bomb explodes after 5 secs or when activated again.
The bomb deals 25/50/75/100/125 + AP damage to all in the explosion zone 

R - Soul Storm - All Souls - 180 sec CD
After 3/2.5/2 secs Braegis Unleashes all of his stored souls in a furious storm that drifts in the chosen direction for 800/1000/1200 range.
The storm deals damage equal to the number of souls released x 10 + AP to all caught in its path.
Tethered enemies take half the damage again over 5 secs.
